title: WTB: The following T206 Highlanders W/ tougher backs
author: Tobacco&Gum

posts.post_title: WTB: The following T206 Highlanders W/ tougher backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following cards in VG (or worse) condition.

Not really expecting to find any of these. Just kinda shaking the Net54 fruit tree, and hoping something falls ;)


Carolina Brights: Demmitt, Knight W/ Bat, Quinn, Warhop

P460 F25: Chase Dark Cap, Manning Pitching, Sweeney

AB460: Ford, Frill, Manning Pitching

AB350 No Frame: Manning Pitching, Sweeney

Sovereign 460: Chase Dark Cap, Ford, Frill

Cycle 460: Chase Dark Cap, Ford, Frill, Manning Pitching, Sweeney

SC460 F25: Chase Dark Cap, Frill, Sweeney

AB350 Frame: Engle, Knight Portriat, Knight W/ Bat, Laporte, Quinn, Warhop

Sovereign 350 Apple Green: Joe Doyle.

Please PM or Email me [url]TheBabe1918@aol.com[/url] if you are looking to sell any of these

Thanks
I don't believe the Chase dark cap comes in an SC 460 fact 25 back

Here's the back of my chase dark cap SGC 40:
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/12/09/16/4y7a3yny.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="t206hound" post=1036789]Here's the back of my chase dark cap SGC 40:
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/12/09/16/4y7a3yny.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

I stand corrected.  I was going by the info in Scot Reader's tomb, unless I was misreading it or using an outdated version.

--S

p.s.  don't mean to hijack the OPs thread, figure the bump can't hurt anyway, but if you object I'll gladly move the conversation off your thread as proper etiquette.

[quote name="shaunsteig" post=1037690]don't mean to hijack the OPs thread, figure the bump can't hurt anyway, but if you object I'll gladly move the conversation off your thread as proper etiquette.[/QUOTE]

No worries whatsoever...... Thanks for the picture Erick

I just wanted to add, that if you do pm with a card that you're looking to sell, rather than asking me to make an offer I would prefer you include the price you're looking to get for it. 

I know some sellers do this, and that's OK but I really don't like to buy this way.

Thanks, and have a good day!
